content.rendered:
The Outback Armour 6T/9M Snatch Strap is designed and certified to provide a minimum of 20% stretch under full rated load during a vehicle recovery.

Features of this snatch strap include: cordura shielded eyes, neoprene sleeves to protect the stitching from abrasion and velcro keepers for tidy storage.

It is very important that the correct snatch strap is used that is suited to the smaller vehicle involved in the recovery (between 2-3 times the GVM).

Specifications Details
Length: 9 metres
Strength: 6 tonne
Material: nylon
Colour: outback orange
Suits GVM: 2T-3T vehicle

excerpt.rendered: Never go alone.. but you’ll need your own straps for recovery!
